content: From The Emerald Hall altar, go right and continue along the main path head up the stairs and onto the ashen path. Follow it up and around to the left, crossing over the bridge and heading toward the archway in the distance.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Crimson-Silver_Cart.md', within the main section titled 'Crimson-Silver Cart'.
The content is as follows:
From The Emerald Hall altar, go right and continue along the main path head up the stairs and onto the ashen path. Follow it up and around to the left, crossing over the bridge and heading toward the archway in the distance.
